mapDamage
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which mapDamage installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using mapDamage, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load mapDamage/2.2.1-foss-2021b
```
